title: Executive Order 5641-Restoration of Certain Lands from Salmon Hatchery Reservation, Alaska
content: It is hereby ordered that Executive order of February 1, 1906, reserving certain lands on Yes Lake in the Cleveland Peninsula in southeastern Alaska as a site for a salmon hatchery be, and the same is hereby, revoked as to the tract of land now identified as United States Survey No. 1981, comprising 6.33 acres.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5641-Restoration of Certain Lands from Salmon Hatchery Reservation, Alaska Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361238
